text: Events in the year 2021 in Manipur. == Incumbents == * Chief Minister: Nongthombam Biren Singh * Governor: Najma Heptulla == Events == * Ongoing - COVID-19 pandemic * 22 March 2021 – 29 April 2021 — 2021 Manipur State League * April — Imphal East District Polo Tournament 2021 * December — Imphal West District Polo Tournament 2021 Category:2021 in India Category:Manipur
